title: SPAC shareholders agree to delay merger with Trump media company
description: The move buys time as federal regulators investigate the proposed merger that would take the parent of Truth Social public.

title: Advertisers are dropping Twitter. Musk can’t afford to lose any more.
description: Dozens of top Twitter advertisers, including 14 of the top 50, have stopped advertising in the few weeks since Elon Musk’s chaotic acquisition of the social media company.

title: There will never be anything like Twitter again
description: The struggles of Facebook and Twitter spell the end of the central ideal of social media as a common gathering places for all to gather and listen.

title: French regulator warns Twitter of legal duty to moderate misinformation, hate
description: The letter from France's audiovisual and digital regulator Arcom comes as Twitter, under Elon Musk's ownership, has laid off half of its staff.

title: Musk’s ‘free speech’ agenda dismantles safety work at Twitter, insiders say
description: Musk arrived at Twitter with a key priority: restore the Babylon Bee.
